markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs=""
>
[Choker of Elocution](/Equipment.aspx?ID=422)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn collar

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This platinum choker bears characters from a language’s alphabet, and it gives knowledge of that language and the associated culture’s customs. You gain a +1 item bonus to Society checks and the ability to understand, speak, and write the chosen language. Your excellent elocution reduces the DC of the flat check to perform an auditory action while deafened from 5 to 3.

**Craft Requirements** You know the language or languages the choker grants.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Choker of Elocution
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Choker of Elocution (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +2. The choker bears characters from three languages and grants fluency in all three.
name: Choker of Elocution
